item.description:
Please note the location for this event has changed from what was previously posted! It's also starting a little earlier than previously indicated to allow some time to talk before the music starts at 8:00 PM.

Please RSVP at least a couple of days in advance so we can researve the right size table.

Meet friendly people age 35+ who enjoy week-end partying together (with access to a cash bar and food, as well as a small jazz band) in the Fairmont Copley Plaza Hotel. This Meetup group is recommended by our very own Robyn Laing!

The Oak Bar is one of the most elegant venues in Boston and a pleasure to be part of it's history and beauty.

Come for:
Classy centrally located hotel venue, on the T & bus route, and easy to get to by car

$12 validated valet parking at the hotel

NO COVER CHARGE!!

Bar and food options available. (It is a little pricey, so you may want to do an appetizer or a dessert rather than a full dinner.)

Dancing to a 4 piece jazz band

Meeting fun people in the Beanstalks’ demographic who also like to have a good time! Come on, let’s show ‘em how!

Dress is dressy casual or better.
item.how_to_find_us: Tell the hostess you're looking for Marianne
item.name: Boston 35+ Meetup Get Together in Back Bay
